## 2025

### Papercuts triaging

- Popover layer issues: Make popovers, hovers and context menus share the same layer, only one can exist at a time
  - https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/issues/23367

    - n items tall, when more than that fix height<|user_cursor_is_here|> 
    
## Week 4

### https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/22668

- Nate: Concerned about lines moving with multiline diagnostics
- Danilo: I haven't looked into this one at all as it seems pretty significant/big. Given it's an optional setting, it concerns me less. Curious to explore whether there are conflicts with everything that happens after code in lines (Git blame, inline completions, etc.)

### https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/21675

Nate: LGTM, should be ready to merge

### https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/21337

Nate: I think there are a number of design issues here: icons, toolbar item clarity, how we want it to work. I'll be jumping in this one directly to take a look and see if I can expedite some of it.

Nate: Latest commit doesn't compile, waiting on an update

### https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/17224

Nate: I don't think design feedback is needed here, but it did make me think about this idea: https://zed-industries.slack.com/archives/C04S5TU0RSN/p1737476244377949

### https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/22418

Nate: Proposed a more subtle approach: https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/22418#issuecomment-2605253667

- https://github.com/zed-industries/zed/pull/20506

<|editable_region_end|>
